answer:
You will need to contact your local public health unit to make an appointment for your child to get immunized.  You can find the contact information for your local public health unit here. 
- Immunization Nurse
question: Can I make an appointment to have my child get immunized at the health unit instead of at school?
question_variation_0: can my child be immunized at health unit instead of school
question_variation_1: do immunizations need to be done at school instead of at school
